channel.title: Streaming Platform on FinanClub

item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:86 Chances: Comcast (CMCSA) reported fourth quarter earnings and revenue that topped Wall Street targets.The company raised its annual dividend and announced a new $15 billion stock buyback.Net income rose over 7% on a year-over-year basis.Comcast added around 3 million subscribers to its streaming platform Peacock, a 50% year-over-year gain.
